quiz.title: General Knowledge Quiz
quiz.description: Test your knowledge with these interesting questions

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital and largest city of France.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is called the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance caused by iron oxide on its surface.

questions.question: Who painted the Mona Lisa?
questions.explanation: Leonardo da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa in the early 16th century.

questions.question: What is the largest ocean on Earth?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean, covering about 63 million square miles.

questions.question: In what year did World War II end?
questions.explanation: World War II ended in 1945 with the surrender of Japan in September.

questions.question: What is the smallest country in the world?
questions.explanation: Vatican City is the smallest country in the world with an area of about 0.17 square miles.
